Literal.Value: 'Is equipment in the area available to complete the tasks'
'Are gas cylinders being kept in concrete/non-combustible stores or cages when not in use?'
'Are oxygen cylinders separated from flammable gases (3m distance or non-combustible barrier)?'
'Are the bunds sufficient (110% of largest container or 25% of the total - whichever is larger)?'
'Are the chemical cabinets closed and in good condition?'
'Are there any visible breaches in perimeter fencing?'
'Has damaged equipment, if any, been clearly quarantined?'
'Have minor spills been promptly cleaned up?'
'Have you assessed the risk to staff and visitors?'
'Have you assessed the risks of fire in your workplace?'
'Have you found anything that could burn?'
'Have you found anything that could start a fire?'
'Have you kept any source of fuel and heat/sparks apart?'
'Have you removed or secured any fuel an arsonist could use?'
'Are all fire escape routes and emergency exits free from obstacles?'
'Are all switchboxes, panel boards and sockets covered?'
'Are appropriate guards in place on moving parts of machinery?'
'Are barriers around floor openings and restricted access areas being used?'
'Are crash barriers installed around large liquid storage tanks?'
'Are Defibrillator pads and batteries within their experation date?'
'Are emergency spill kits available and fully stocked in high spill risk areas such as fuel storage and fuelling facilities?'
'Are fire extinguishers within their experation date and on stands/hung on walls?'
'Are floors in a good condition and non-slip?'
'Are ladders, steps, and platforms tagged with an inspection record that is in date?'
'Are lifting accessories tagged with the correct coloured inspection tag?'
'Are materials and objects adequately stored or stacked to prevent them from falling?'
'Are perimiter fences clear of trees or other objects that could be used to climb over fences, or hide potential trespassers?'
'Are Weekly Site Inspections being completed completed each week, with suitable issues being identified and corrected, Is the Project Lead completing one each per month?'
'Are Weekly Site Inspections being completed each week, with suitable issues being identified and corrected, Is the Project Lead completing one each per month?'
'Last audit actions closed out within specified dates?'
'Low level work at height / falling Objects'
